questions.question_text: What type of packet creates and performs network operations on a network device?
Which two statements about stateless firewalls are true? (Choose two.)
questions.answer: E. The Cisco ASA is implicitly stateless because it blocks all traffic by default.
questions.answer_ET: E. The Cisco ASA is implicitly stateless because it blocks all traffic by default.

choices.C: Cisco IOS cannot implement them because the platform is stateful by nature.
choices.B: They compare the 5-tuple of each incoming packet against configurable rules.
choices.A: They are designed to work most efficiently with stateless protocols such as HTTP or HTTPS.

questions.answer: D. Inline, before the internet router and firewall
questions.question_text: Which option is the most effective placement of an IPS device within the infrastructure?

choices.B: Promiscuously, after the Internet router and before the firewall
choices.C: Inline, behind the internet router and firewall
choices.A: Promiscuously, before the internet router and the firewall

questions.answer_ET: D. Inline, before the internet router and firewall
D. Authentication attempts to the router will be denied

choices.B: The use will be prompted to authenticate using the enable password
choices.A: Authentication will use the router's local database
choices.C: Authentication attempts will be sent to the TACACS+ server

questions.question_text: If a router configuration includes the line aaa authentication login default group tacacs+ enable, which events will occur when the TACACS+ server returns an error? (Choose two)
questions.answer: D. Authentication attempts to the router will be denied
